Two killed in West Bank shooting attack, Israel saysTwo men were killed in a shooting attack in the Israeli-occupied West Bank on Thursday, Israeli emergency services said. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 18:22:21 GMT VHSQZHRLEBIZJIHZKL3DUOLJWI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/two-killed-west-bank-shooting-attack-israel-says-2024-02-29/Reuters世界中东
About 20 migrants die in shipwreck off Senegal's coastAbout 20 migrants died this week when their boat capsized off the coast of northern Senegal, Prime Minister Amadou Ba said on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 18:12:16 GMT 3FCYQZGI6BISFOVCG3TL5IHXVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/about-20-migrants-die-shipwreck-off-senegals-coast-2024-02-29/Reuters世界非洲
Russian-American woman detained for treason said Russia was 'safe' before trip thereA Russian-American detained in Russia on a treason charge carrying up to 20 years in prison told her boyfriend "it's safe there" before she travelled to see relatives in Yekaterinburg, the woman's former mother-in-law said. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:54:52 GMT 4QFLFXDA2JIGNKIBRGFU4X4M7U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-american-woman-detained-treason-said-Russia-was-safe-before-trip-there-2024-02-29/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
Canada's prescription drugs plan likely won't impact budget, minister saysCanada's Liberal government on Thursday introduced broad outlines of a national scheme to cover the cost of prescription drugs and said it will not mean a lot of extra spending in the upcoming budget year, the health minister said. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:50:35 GMT HNLTSOJ7UZMJ5AIEONUZ5UW2LQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canadas-prescription-drugs-plan-likely-wont-impact-budget-minister-says-2024-02-29/Reuters世界美洲
Ex-Tanzanian president Mwinyi, who launched country's free market, dead at 98Former Tanzanian President Ali Hassan Mwinyi, credited with ushering the East African nation into free market economics, has died at age 98, current President Samia Suluhu Hassan said on Thursday in a television broadcast. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:38:54 GMT 2CP4S273VNLZVGFXVKCEPTAMMY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ex-tanzanian-president-mwinyi-has-died-current-president-says-2024-02-29/Reuters世界非洲
Congo opposition spokesman's death ruled a suicideA prosecutor in the Democratic Republic of Congo said on Thursday that the death of a former minister and opposition party member last year has been ruled as suicide. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:19:48 GMT 23ZEBTKEPRP47KJWSSS5LYJUFI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-opposition-spokesmans-death-ruled-suicide-2024-02-29/Reuters世界非洲
US judge blocks Texas law cracking down on illegal border crossingsA federal judge in Texas on Thursday blocked the Republican-led state's new law giving officials broad powers to arrest, prosecute and order the removal of people who illegally cross the U.S.-Mexico border. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:14:44 GMT J5A72Q2F7NMMVPBSVPGUQLHX7I https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-judge-blocks-texas-law-cracking-down-illegal-border-crossings-2024-02-29/Daniel Wiessner合法的政府
G20 finance leaders still at odds over language on Gaza, Ukraine - sourcesFinance leaders of the G20 major countries are still debating how to describe wars in Ukraine and Gaza in a joint communique, with Russia and mostly Western nations at loggerheads over the language, two G20 sources told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:11:06 GMT RFBL3WUULFNAJC7PMQQAQF3UX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/g20-finance-leaders-still-odds-over-language-gaza-ukraine-sources-2024-02-29/Marcela Ayres, Christian Kraemer世界
Ukraine increases use of domestic-made military equipment, official saysUkraine has significantly increased its use of domestic-made weapons and military equipment, a senior defence official said on Thursday, as Kyiv aims to become more self-sufficient amid faltering Western military aid. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 17:04:41 GMT DCDGVGUCMVIZJLQR3SDHLJNFJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-increases-use-domestic-made-military-equipment-official-says-2024-02-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: A halt to Gaza fighting would trigger Lebanon ceasefire talks, PM saysA halt to fighting in the Gaza Strip as early as next week would trigger indirect talks to end hostilities along Lebanon's southern border with Israel, Lebanon's caretaker prime minister Najib Mikati said on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 16:19:43 GMT SAKGUGQVNNIM3CHJPPZFZOV3YA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/halt-gaza-fighting-would-trigger-lebanon-ceasefire-talks-pm-says-2024-02-29/Laila Bassam, Maya Gebeily世界中东
Church hosting Navalny's funeral is steeped in the war he opposedAlexei Navalny was a Christian who condemned the invasion of Ukraine as a crazy enterprise built on lies. But the church that was designated to host his funeral has donated to the Russian army and enthusiastically advertised its backing for the war. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 15:56:06 GMT OACZXIEA7BLCXNIWFEMXARVUZE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/church-hosting-navalnys-funeral-is-steeped-war-he-opposed-2024-02-29/Mark Trevelyan, Filipp Lebedev世界欧洲
